text: Joaquín Mariano Pérez-Febles (15 May 1937 – 14 October 2023) was a Cuban rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1956 Summer Olympics. Pérez died in McLean, Virginia on 14 October 2023, at the age of 86. == References == Category:1937 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Cuban rowers Category:Olympians for Cuba
title: Joaquín Pérez
